# SPEA-E 538 Fall 2023

<div class="row">
<div class="col-sm-6">

### *Statistics for Environmental Science* 

#### Mallory Barnes
Last updated: `r Sys.Date()`

All resources are completely **free and open**, including the [textbook](https://malloryb.github.io/statistics_E538/), and [lab manual](https://malloryb.github.io/statisticsLab_E538/).

### Copying/Adopting these Resources

This website is composed using R Markdown. The customized source code can be found [here](https://malloryb.github.io/statistics_E538_website/). For the original materials by Crump, please find the repos for the [website](https://github.com/CrumpLab/psyc3400), the [original textbook](https://github.com/CrumpLab/statistics), and the [lab manual](https://github.com/CrumpLab/statisticsLab). Feel free to modify them according to your own requirements.
